mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fiduciary Accounts: Guardianship of Henry W. Hylton, Until he reached 21 years of age 07.12.1899
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Guardianship of Henry W. Hylton, Until he reached 21 years of age 07.12.1899 S.F. Hylton, Guardian Recorded in Ledger Book 5 page 74, in the Floyd County Courthouse. Date recorded as September 11th, 1899 term
